sections.aboutMe: I am currently studying computer science (2nd year) at the University of Silesia in Katowice. My specialization is web development. I started my adventure in programming at the technical school in Oświęcim, where I graduated with the title of IT Technician. Since then, I have been perfecting my skills in many technologies, but I mainly specialize in creating various websites and web applications that are responsive and user-friendly.

your-movies.name: Your Movies
your-movies.description: Application written in Next.js for searching for movies and series. It allows you to check information about titles and track cinema premieres. It is possible, for example, to watch a trailer for a given title. Data comes from the TMDB API.

money-mate.name: MoneyMate
money-mate.description: Application with role authorization - admin and user. It is used to manage finances. It allows you to add income and expenses, as well as filter and search them. Created in Next.js (with shadcn/ui) + RTK Query. API was created in Laravel.

projex-hub.name: ProjexHUB
projex-hub.description: Application with login, allows project management. Users can filter and search projects. Tasks can be created and users can be added to each project. Website created based on MERN stack.

website-for-the-company.name: Website for the company
website-for-the-company.description: Complete website template for an example company with several subpages. The site uses Bootstrap and CSS animations.

games.name: Games
games.description: A gaming site featuring Tic Tac Toe, Memory, Hangman, and Rock-Paper-Scissors. Each game has different modes. App written in React.js.

to-do-list.name: To-Do List
to-do-list.description: An interactive to-do list that you can manage as you wish. The list is saved in cookies on an ongoing basis. Written in pure TypeScript.

mini-apps.name: Mini Apps
mini-apps.description: Website with a clock, weather forecast and stopwatch. The website uses a simple API to get the current weather. Website created in pure JavaScript.
